hadiths.text: Jabir said:"The Prophet and his Companions only performed Sai between As-Safa and Al-Marwah once

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ طَوَافُ الْقَارِنِ وَالْمُتَمَتِّعِ بَيْنَ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةِ}
chapter.eng-name: How Many Times Should Those Performing Hajj Al-Qiran And Hajj Tamattu Go Between As-Safa and Al-Marwah?
